attributes.action: urge the BBC to abandon their new-look credits, and replace them with ones that are easy to read.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These credits are vital to the professionals who work on BBC television programmes - actors, writers, camera crew, etc, especially new talent, as they can lead to further employment.  Also, anyone wanting to find out the name of an actor whose performance they have enjoyed risks ruining their eyesight to do so.

Please, BBC, reconsider.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
